title: Category
description: Defines the schema for categories used to organize transactions within a ledger application. Categories can be default, modified, or custom, providing flexibility in categorization.

id.description: A unique identifier for the category.

description.description: A description of the category, providing additional context. Can be null if not specified.

parentId.description: The identifier of the parent category, if any. Null if the category is top-level.

defaultCategoryId.description: For custom categories, this indicates the default category from which this was derived. Required if categoryType is CUSTOM.

categoryType.description: The type of the category, indicating whether it is a default, modified, or custom category.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the category was created, in ISO 8601 format.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the category was last updated, in ISO 8601 format. Can be null if the category has never been updated.
